text: Oscar Luigi Scalfaro (; 9 September 1918 â€“ 29 January 2012) was an Italian politician. He was the ninth President of the Italian Republic from 1992 to 1999, and later a senator for life. ==References== ==Other websites== *Encyclopaedia Britannica, Oscar Luigi Scalfaro - full access article * La biografia del presidente * Category:1918 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Presidents of Italy Category:Politicians from Piedmont Category:People from Novara Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy)
